```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
host <- params$host
dbName <- params$dbName
username <- params$username
password <- params$password
```


```{python}
import psycopg2
import pandas

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
      dbname = r$dbName,
      user = r$username,
      host = r$host,
      password = r$password
    )
except:
    print("Unable to connect to database")
cur = conn.cursor()
cur.execute("SELECT * FROM agent A WHERE A.salary > 200000;")
cur.fetchall()
```


```{python}
conn.close()
```
